Package com.scriptrts.core.ui

Class Summary
Action Action that can be run on a hotkey press
ButtonArea Button area to display command buttons
Console In-game terminal implemented as a Swing component.
GameMenu Button panel which pops up in the center of the screen when the user clicks on a menu bar item
HotkeyManager Manages hotkeys for game
ImageButton A button that can be painted onto the screen.
InputManager Universal input manager for the entire user interface of the game.
MapPainter Painter which displays map terrain tiles on the screen.
Minimap Minimap panel which displays a miniature colored version of the map on the overlay panel
OverlayPane Main bottom overlay
SelectionArea Selection area panel which display all units which are currently selected
TopBar Top bar interface element
UnitPainter Painter which draws units onto the screen on top of the map.
Viewport Viewport defining how the user is looking at the game map.
